name: Squidstribution Prototype
description:
Unity project made for University game jam/group project.

The game is all about controlling a kaiju sized squid to destroy a city with high above point and click game play in order to balance out the feng shui to gain karma.

Made in collaboration with fellow team mates: Charlie Evans (twitter, Github, itch), Alex Hillman (twitter, Github), Alex Long (twitter, Github) , Stephanie Chan (Github)

(Me too: (Github, twitter)

There are aims to rebase the github repository and improve the game with a fresh start later on too hopefully.
